analysis.summary: Audited 16534 pages. 6717 pages no longer exist on Drupal (archived content). 119 pages have actual title differences requiring review.
recommendations: Most 'mismatches' are archived Drupal pages - Hugo has content that Drupal no longer serves
Actual title differences are mostly cosmetic (HTML entities, abbreviations)
Review the 119 actual title differences for intentional changes vs errors
